references.paper_title: Microsoft COCO: common objects in context
references.reason: This is a foundational paper as it introduces the widely used COCO dataset, which is used for object detection, segmentation, and captioning and also provides the evaluation metric followed in this paper.
This paper introduces Mask R-CNN, an influential architecture for instance segmentation that extends Faster R-CNN and whose architecture is heavily related to the proposed methods in this paper.
This paper is a foundational work because it introduces the RefCOCO dataset for referring expression comprehension, a key benchmark used in the paper for evaluating models.

references.paper_title: Grounding dino: Marrying dino with grounded pre-training for open-set object detection
references.reason: This paper introduces Grounding DINO, an influential open-set object detection model leveraged in the proposed RexSeek for its robust perception ability.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a visual-language pre-training model that is used to extract low-resolution image features Flow in the proposed RexSeek architecture.
